title: ‘A Card to Play’: Matteo Jorgenson Moves to Center of Visma-Lease a Bike’s in-Crisis Classics Core
content:
In-form, injury-free Jorgenson poised for crucial role in Wout van Aert's under pressure cobblestone crew at Dwars, Tour of Flanders.

Read the full article at ‘A Card to Play’: Matteo Jorgenson Moves to Center of Visma-Lease a Bike’s in-Crisis Classics Core on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
